docs.text: Welcome to Grihsvachalnam For full documentation visit Grihasvachalnam This project is about home automation for city and suburbs. Top most priority or this project is to provide stable, accurate, echonomical and user friendly solution.

docs.text: Grihasvachalnam Stage-1 Using wifi bulb Bulbs Amason basic Bulb 9W Smart LED Bulb with Alexa, Google Assistant Bluetooth, Wifi Enabled B22D Holder Control Method : Voice Installing bulb and connection Connect Your mobile to WiFi(2.4 GHz) Download and install the Smart Life App on your mobile device (Phone/ tab) Register/Login to Smart Life App Install the build in bulb holder (not screw type) Switch on bulb, The light pulsates, it's ready for pairing Follow the steps and add the bulb to app Rename it if you want for, for convenience of voice use Connecting with Alex device Steps

docs.text: Connect Your mobile to WiFi(2.4 GHz) Download and install the Smart Life App on your mobile device (Phone/ tab) Register/Login to Smart Life App Install the build in bulb holder (not screw type) Switch on bulb, The light pulsates, it's ready for pairing Follow the steps and add the bulb to app Rename it if you want for, for convenience of voice use
